name: Mole Maiden
storyline: The Burrow Miner League is the most popular sport in R&D Mine, and all Penny wants is to fight her big sister Coppra, the Burrow League Champion. To do so, Penny needs to leave home, explore R&D Mine, defeat the six Burrow League Captains, and finally face her sister in the ultimate battle!
summary: Mole Maiden is a brand-new 2D Action Adventure inspired by 16-bit classics like Pokemon, Metroid, and Punch-Out. Explore a vast interconnected world chalk full of tricky platforming challenges, diverse characters, quirky boss fights, and a whole bunch of juicy secrets; as you work towards your ultimate goal to become the very best!
